com.google.common.truth

Class Truth8

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.truth.Truth8

  • public final class Truth8
extends Object
    A set of static methods to begin a Truth assertion chain for types that require java8.

    Note: Usage of different failure strategies such as assume and expect should rely on StandardSubjectBuilder.about(com.google.common.truth.Subject.Factory) to begin a chain with those alternative behaviors.
